summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6249 for the improvement of Fox Ave. South from South Myrtle Street to South Brighton Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 90219, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
